message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. I think it could really benefit you. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider meeting me halfway?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  To make this work, I can come down to $12,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $11,000. Can you consider this compromise?
